definitions.text: has a good chance of being the case or of coming about
examples: these services are likely to be available to us all before long
a likely place for a restaurant
the broken limb is likely to fall

definitions.text: likely but not certain to be or become true or real
expected to become or be; in prospect
with considerable certainty; without much doubt
examples: He is probably out of the country
in all likelihood we are headed for war
